paper.title: Efficient identity-based key encapsulation to multiple parties

author.org: Departamento de Informática, Universidade do Minho, Braga, Portugal#TAB#
Dept. of Computer Science, University of Bristol, Bristol, United Kingdom

paper.abstract: We introduce the concept of identity based key encapsulation to multiple parties (mID-KEM), and define a security model for it. This concept is the identity based analogue of public key KEM to multiple parties. We also analyse possible mID-KEM constructions, and propose an efficient scheme based on bilinear pairings. We prove our scheme secure in the random oracle model under the Gap Bilinear Diffie-Hellman assumption.
